summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Acne Solutions Liquid Makeup Foundation is a skin-clearing treatment foundation powered by salicylic acid to help cover, clear, and prevent acne.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination, Combination Oily, OilyLiquid foundation with natural matte coverage helps treat and prevent acneNow in an extended shade range so you're sure to meet your matchOil-free foundation with 0.5% USP grade salicylic acid helps visibly unclog pores, clear blemishes, and prevent future breakoutsLightweight formula instantly blurs pores and mattifiesBlends away blemishes with moderate coverage and a natural matte finishControls oil and shine all dayDermatologist testedOphthalmologist testedAllergy tested100% fragrance freeKey IngredientsSalicylic acid: helps clear clogged pores and acneLactobacillus ferment plus skin-soothing ingredients like red algae extract, licorice, and caffeine help visibly reduce rednessResearch ResultsIn 10 days, bare skin has significantly fewer visibly clogged pores.**Clinical testing on 22 women after using the product for 10 days.Item 2619813How To UseFor best results, start with clean, moisturized skin.Shake bottle well. Squeeze a few drops of foundation onto the back of your clean hand.With Foundation Brush or clean fingertips, smooth makeup into skin, starting in center of face, blending out toward hairline and jawline.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Methyl Trimethicone, Nylon-12, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat., Peg-10 Dimethicone, Dimethicone, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Trehalose, Calcium Stearate, Salicylic Acid, Zinc Pca, Algae Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Glycyrrhetinic Acid, Glycerin, Caffeine, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Methicone, Lauryl Peg-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, 10-Hydroxydecanoic Acid, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Dipropylene Glycol, Tromethamine, Lecithin, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Propylene Carbonate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tocopherol, Sodium Citrate, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Benzoic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, [+/- Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For best results, start with clean, moisturized skin.Shake bottle well. Squeeze a few drops of foundation onto the back of your clean hand.With Foundation Brush or clean fingertips, smooth makeup into skin, starting in center of face, blending out toward hairline and jawline.

reviews.headline: underrated
reviews.comments: picked this up on a whim, and I used it for prom. I like to use with elf power grip primer and it stays on well and looks dewy which I like. If I want more coverage then I mix in rem beauty sweetener foundation.

reviews.headline: Pros and cons
reviews.comments: I switched from Estee Lauder Doublewear bc of breakouts. This comes off easier, leading to less b.o.'s. It's not as opaque and sets into fine lines if you let it. My oily zones do push it out by the end of the day, but I'll trade shine for brkouts.

reviews.headline: This is good for acne prone skin but..
reviews.comments: I went in store to grab this foundation. I have bad acne anthring literally can break me out, and I got one of the lightest shades. But it oxidizes so bad it went from being my foundation shade to going 2 shades darker i lighten it up with a really bright concealer but i will be returning this and going on another hunt for a foundation that doesn't break me out

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Love the coverage from this product. Have oily skin and so really appreciate that this acne solution base with a great matte finish. My new go to.

reviews.headline: New formula not working for me
reviews.comments: Have worn Acne Solutions for many years and considered it perfect foundation for me. Last bottle I bought seemed like there was something wrong with it. It turns my fingers white and doesn't blend well and color seems off. Saw others with same complaints who said this is a new formula. Please bring old formula back or I will have to find a new foundation.

reviews.headline: I would but this product again
reviews.comments: I love these foundation it stays on my face all day and I have really oily skin, I get so many compliments and it's somewhat waterproof, went swimming and it stayed on.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love this makeup being using it for several years now.

reviews.headline: Formula Changedâ€¦Not for the Better
reviews.comments: I used this foundation for about 10 years. It was my holly grail! Went on smooth and never broke me out. However, the last bottle I purchased was nothing but a disaster. Constant break outs, it clings to any dry patchesâ€¦but over all it looks extremly cakey and dry on the skin. I tried multiple different moisturizers and primers but nothing seemed to work. I then decided to look into it and read that the formula had been changed. How unfortunateâ€¦I went out and purchashed a completely different foundation of another brand that has given me no problems. I would NOT recommend this foundation.

reviews.headline: I loved It!!!!
reviews.comments: It was perfect!! I'm buying it for all of my friends

reviews.headline: How does this have so many stars??
reviews.comments: I don't know if I'm not doing something right, but it definitely doesn't give you smooth coverage. It looks dry, flakey, and inconsistent. I used primer and my sponge was wet. I also tried doing it without primer with a wet sponge, and also a dry sponge with no luck. Super disappointed that a bottle of decently expensive foundation is going to waste ðŸ˜­. The only pro of this is foundation is that it doesn't cause acne.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: A great color match. Easy on my acne prone skin. So glad this product is available. A dream come true for me. Also covers up roscea like magic. I have a darker version for the summer months. This color I am writing about will get used when there isn't much sun in Ohio.

reviews.headline: I love this foundation
reviews.comments: I love this foundation! It is so good for my skin type (sensitive and some spotting) it has a medium coverage but you can defined build it up.

reviews.headline: Formula changed
reviews.comments: Use to love this. It oxidizes right to orange. For reference I was using 10 Alabaster.

reviews.headline: Fresh Alabaster
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years. It made my skin look amazing. Within the last six months something has changed in the formula. Now after application my face looks cakey and orange. Please go back to the original formula! Now I am going to be on the search for a new foundation.

reviews.headline: THE BEST FOUNDATION IVE EVER USED
reviews.comments: nothing blends better with my skin as this one does!!! Its insane. Would repurchase

reviews.headline: Loved the product until they changed formula
reviews.comments: New formula is orange :(

reviews.headline: Why?
reviews.comments: What the.. orange? Ive been using the shade ivory for 15  years now and it has looked amazing. Got a new bottle the other day and now my skin is oily and ORANGE! It is very apparent Clinque has changed the formula. But why??

reviews.headline: will give you breakout and dry cracky skin
reviews.comments: i have used this foundation ever since highschool when i was breaking out and nothing else works but with this new formula ive noticed that it gives me tiny breakouts and leave your skin super dry and crack when i removed it w cotton padsâ€¦.not to mention the orange effect it had after an hour into wearing you will basically look like oompa loompas if you wear this out during a hot dayâ€¦.

reviews.headline: will give you breakout and dry cracky skin
reviews.comments: i have used this foundation ever since highschool when i was breaking out and nothing else works but with this new formula ive noticed that it gives me tiny breakouts and leave your skin super dry and crack when i removed it w cotton padsâ€¦.not to mention the orange effect it had after an hour into wearing you will basically look like oompa loompas if you wear this out during a hot dayâ€¦.

reviews.headline: super good for acne skin/natural coverage
reviews.comments: I always got compliments from people saying my skin looked so good when in reality i was wearing this foundation! Its super natural looking, blends well, isnt dry or anything. I love the Clinique brand the only reason im switching it for another clinique foundation is becuase i want more coverage, but other than that, totally recommend.

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is my first review of a Clinique product, though I have been using them for a few years. In looking at the somewhat mixed reviews of this product. I think people don't understand that this product is for a certain type of skin (oily and acne prone) and to be used as part of a particular type of regimen (do not mix this with other acne topicals unless you intend to).

This foundation works GREAT for me. Mainly, it DOES NOT BREAK ME OUT like nearly every other foundation and even many other Clinique products I seriously break out from so many things, I have to be super careful about what I put on my face.

I give this five stars because this product is made for oily and acne prone skin, yet it works like a high end foundation. THANK YOU for making make up that those of us with very picky skin and easily clogged pores can use.

This has salacylic acid acne medication in it. This is why it is not for the faint of heart. You are basically putting a specific acne MEDICINE all over your face. SA is often used in "spot" treatments but it really is better as an all-over preventative. But using too much of is (such as mixing with another SA topical, or other acne topicals, you can go too far and irritate your skin. So I use this with only sunscreen or moisturizer underneath it during the day, and use any other acne medicine at night.

SA causes the top layer of your skin to turn over faster, basically. For those of us whose skin clogs because, in part, the top layer is not turning over fast enough (there are other factors too) this is great to have incroporated into a foundation that also doesn't break you out. If you don't need it, it might be slighly irritating like if you used too much retinol or something similar.

TL;DR: If you have oliy and break-out skin and have responded well to salacylic acid in the past, are looking for a foundation with some buildable coverage, oil control, and if you already have a sunscreen or moisturizer you like to wear under your foundation, give this a try.
faceoff_positive.headline: Not for the faint of heart

faceoff_negative.comments:
I have been a Clinique customer for many, many years and just love the Clarifying tube and Clarifying powder. When I saw this item I thought well the other acne products work very well so lets give this a try. WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

After using for a few weeks I started getting worse than usual breakouts and this was the only thing I changed in my daily skin regimine. It goes on too thick and doesn't cover like it says it does. It feels like a think layer on top of the skin and does not cover the redness. After 5 hours of wear my skin was getting shiny and oily.

When I spoke to a Clinique consultant they recommended a powder on top of the makeup to "set it in". So now it feels even thicker on my skin and I am having to buy 2 products to do the job of one!

The Clarifying Powder was an awesome procduct that controled shiny, oily skin, helped with breakouts, and went on in a few seconds.

With this new product you have to work it from the center of your face to the hairline, as stated by their "how to" instructions. Doing this will stretch the delicate skin layers and cause wrinkles.

I am not at all happy with this new product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Why doesn't clinique keep the products that acne customers like and ADD to the options available for oily and acne skin customers. The customers with regular skin have numerous options, but we only have a few items to choose from. Maybe it's time to look at other makeup lines.
faceoff_negative.headline: PLEASE BRING BACK CLARIFYING POWDER!!!!!!!!!!
